quiz.question: In what year did the Titanic sink after hitting an iceberg?
When did the Irish Potato Famine begin, drastically affecting Ireland's population?
When did the fall of the Western Roman Empire traditionally occur with Romulus Augustulus' deposition?
In what year did the Korean War begin?
When did the Norman conquest transform England's ruling class?
When was the Battle of Agincourt fought during the Hundred Years' War?
When did the Protestant Reformation begin with Martin Luther's 95 Theses?
In what year did the English Civil War begin between Royalists and Parliamentarians?
When did the An Lushan Rebellion begin in Tang dynasty China?
When did the Great Fire of London occur?
When was the Manhattan Project's first successful test detonation (Trinity)?
When did the Norman conquest of southern Italy and Sicily largely complete under Roger II?
When did Napoleon Bonaparte crown himself Emperor of the French?
When was the Zimmermann Telegram sent, influencing U.S. entry to World War I?
When was the Battle of Tours where Charles Martel halted Muslim expansion into Europe?
